## isDeferredResult() function

Checks if a result is a deferred result.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isDeferredResult<T>(result: Result<T> | DeferredResult<T>): result is DeferredResult<T>;
```

**Returns:**

result is [DeferredResult](./ts-utils.deferredresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

`true` if the result is a deferred result, `false` otherwise.
